title: Image Contributions
text:
The Duterte Times effort is looking for Creative Commons Licensed images for news articles and other site pages. These images are intended to create value for the benefit of site visitors and readers.
You can send images and information through email or Twitter direct message.

title: Information Contributions
text:
The Duterte Times' effort to promote information dissemination is looking for Creative Commons Licensed information. These information are intended to build the site database and create more value for the benefit of site visitors and readers.
Please send an email for more information.
